CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Appointment_results__c ) = 'Sale pending' || TEXT(Appointment_results__c ) = 'Sale Cancelled' || TEXT(Appointment_results__c ) = 'Sale Turn Down' || TEXT(Appointment_results__c ) = 'Sale Approved' || TEXT(Appointment_results__c ) = 'PM' || TEXT(Appointment_results__c ) = 'Bid Submitted' || TEXT(Appointment_results__c ) = 'Pending Cancel', TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: Demo
